name: Dungeon Delver (itch) (DonovannSmit)
description:
News has spread of a magical chalice that can grant eternal life! You have journeyed far and have arrived at the entrance of the dungeon where it is rumored to be held. Explore the dungeon, find the chalice, and escape with your treasure. 

Use A & D keys to move Left and Right

SPACEBAR to Jump

Music:

"Gothamlicious" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
